project.name: |---- 013-lounge-restyled-v3
project.description:
This project builds on 012-lounge-restyled-v2 and introduces several concepts:
shortcuts: a way to group several related properties (margin, border, background-image, font)
new HTML element: span : it's like a div, but for inline elements. It lets you create a grouping of inline elements.
CSS topics: pseudo-classes: they're used for styling links (a:link, a:visited, etc.) styling of links:
new CSS style: float : to make a div container float in the page.
the lounge-test.html has been added to see how the page flow goes when the floating element is not the first in the page.
